Ruby Arrays & Hashes

Array - Initialization

1 array = []
2 array1 = [nil]
3 array2 = [10, 10]

Array - Index, Part 1

 1 def element_at(arr, index)
 2     arr[index]
 3 end
 4 
 5 def inclusive_range(arr, start_pos, end_pos)
 6     arr[start_pos..end_pos]
 7 end
 8 
 9 def non_inclusive_range(arr, start_pos, end_pos)
10     arr[start_pos...end_pos]
11 end
12 
13 def start_and_length(arr, start_pos, length)
14     arr[start_pos, length]
15 end

Ruby - Part 2

September 22, 2015  |   ruby

Ruby Control Stuctures

Each

1 def scoring(array)
2     array.each do |user|
3         user.update_score
4     end
5 end

Unless

1 def scoring(array)
2     array.each do |user|
3         unless user.is_admin?
4             user.update_score
5         end
6     end
7 end
